name: THE FINAL ULTRA SUPER DUPER CUBE CAVERN DELUXE GOTY EDITION
name_original: THE FINAL ULTRA SUPER DUPER CUBE CAVERN DELUXE GOTY EDITION
description:
Here it is! My first 3D game! Originally intended to just be a little shitpost game for my friend ClicheChloe. This ended up blowing up in proportion although it is still a very short little game like 16 minutes to play through this.

I learned ALOT from this project. It being my first 3D game and my second project with Godot I feel like I really understand how to use this engine and I just learned SO MUCH. Like how to use blender, how to make normal maps, and depth maps, all that stuff. But 3D game dev is like really annoying I feel and I'm very excited to just return to making 2D games :3

So the overall big goal with this was to just make an FPS that FEELS fun to play and have cool game feel and yadada I think I exceeded that goal. The levels and stuff were secondary concern and really it was all created in a week lol... This why the game is so short I would've liked to make it longer but I just feel like it wouldn't be worth it and I really wanna go on and make my own original things.

Music was all created specifically for this game by my friend spookl! check his stuff out pls or i'll come over and muhahaha troll you.
https://twitter.com/satilte_

Controls are located in the txt file!

ALSO FYI The weapon sway fucks up for some people and is way more aggressive than it should be but I genuinely have no clue why this happens. It only happened to one person who tested my game.
